attributes.action: Stop using motorists to fund the entire goverment, And start putting money back into roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The goverment makes far to much money out of drivers and public transport uses, Yet only a very small fraction of the revenue made from these commuters is actualy put back into roads/transport.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
